availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry C. Willis (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Mercer County native. Son of Joseph Willis and Margaret Walker Willis. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850, 1860, and 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 349; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 106; Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1911, Mercer County, file no. 10608; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Mercer County, KY, August 1863, p. 33, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
